title: (x) Shutterstock "Propaganda" western-style font - Mesquite {Yves}
content:
Hello Typophiles:

I’m using a vector illustration from [www.shutterstock.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318093835/http:/www.shutterstock.com/ "www.shutterstock.com") to design a T-Shirt, and I wonder if anyone knows wich font is this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318093835im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Propaganda_6245.jpg)

I know for sure that the “vintage” effect was custom made, so I’m looking for the original typeface...

Thanks!! I’ll be around...

Q™ says: It’s All About The Fonts!!

 [‹ (x) "Blished 2006" fat face - Didoni {Patricia, Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318093835/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36216 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Organic.com logo - custom designed by Pentagram {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318093835/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36186 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Quesito

comments.content:
WOW!!

That was quick!!! I’m impressed...

Thanks a lot Bald Condensed...

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!!

Shows how interested I am in the grossly overused [Adobe Wood Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318093835/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=adobe+wood+type) fonts. :^P

Here’s a direct link to [Mesquite](http://web.archive.org/web/20080318093835/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/mesquite/).

OK, got that, I used that font on other project, son no fearther search is required...

T H A N K S !

Q™ Says: It’s all about the Fonts!!
Yves. So eager to win the race, that you first mix up fonts AND THEN don’t even spell the wrong one right? ;-)
Yeah I know I know. I’m already in holiday mode. :^P
